overview: Traci and her staple of girlfriends from her other films are bored housewives planning a sex toy party where their hubbies show up as surprise guests. Of course Tom Byron and Eric Edwards donâ€™t miss this event while the film clips around to each of them getting hot and horny, Christy Canyon by far best of the bunch even though covering her with dark leather tights seems to look less attractive than the rest.
tagline: Masterpiece Home Video Invites You to... The Ladies in Lace Party
title: Ladies in Lace
